description: This meta describes how to collect payments via Uganda mobile money.

spec.tx_ref: Required: This is a unique reference, unique to the particular transaction being carried out. It is generated by the merchant for every transaction.
spec.amount: Required: This is the amount to be charged it is passed as - (“amount”:10).
spec.currency: Required: This is the specified currency to charge in.(Required currency is UGX)
spec.email: Required: This is the email address of the customer.
spec.order_id: Unique identifier for the mobilemoney transaction to be provided by the merchant.
spec.fullname: This is the customers full name. It should include first and last name of the customer
spec.phone_number: This is the phone number linked to the customer's mobile money account.
spec.client_ip: IP - Internet Protocol. This represents the current IP address of the customer carrying out the transaction.
spec.device_fingerprint: This is the fingerprint for the device being used. It can be generated using a library on whatever platform is being used.
spec.voucher: This is the voucher code generated by the customer. It is meant to be passed in the initial charge request. (only for Vodafone cash).
spec.network: This is the customer's mobile money network provider.
spec.meta: This is to include additional payment information
